name: Tom Collins
description: This classic drink is essentially a ginned-up tall glass of lemonade.
recipeIngredient: Lemon wheel or wedge, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, vigorously shake lemon juice, simple syrup and gin. Strain over fresh ice into a highball glass and top with soda water. Garnish with a wedge or wheel of lemon.
